address: Xã Triệu Nguyên, Huyện Nguyên Bình, Tỉnh Cao Bằng
thought:
**Analyzing the Administrative Restructuring of "Xã Triệu Nguyên" in "Tỉnh Cao Bằng"**

My task is to pinpoint the new administrative unit for the specified address. I begin by confirming that "Tỉnh Cao Bằng" will remain unchanged based on the province resolutions (60-NQ/TW).  Next, I focus on "Xã Triệu Nguyên," identifying it as the ward of interest.  My primary source for this restructuring is Resolution 1657/NQ-UBTVQH15, concerning Cao Bằng.  Scanning this resolution, specifically line 19, I find that "Xã Triệu Nguyên" is merged with "thị trấn Tĩnh Túc" and "xã Vũ Nông" to form the new administrative unit, "xã Tĩnh Túc." This clearly defines the restructuring. Subsequently, I verify the existence and details of "xã Tĩnh Túc" within the "New wards" database, confirming a match for "Xã Tĩnh Túc" in "Tỉnh Cao Bằng." This confirms a clean data match and solidifies my understanding.  I must make sure there are no other resolutions that impact this address.  After reviewing all other available resolutions, I confirm that only Resolution 1657/NQ-UBTVQH15, line 19, directly addresses the requested address and the restructure. With a single, clear resolution defining this change, my confidence in this answer is high.  Therefore, the JSON output, will reflect this information and include the cited resolution and the relevant line.

citation.header: 1657/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Cao Bằng
citation.line: 19. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Tĩnh Túc, xã Triệu Nguyên và xã Vũ Nông thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Tĩnh Túc**.
